mapper.sql: id, name, operator_id, enterprise_id, combo_id, pack_id, create_time, url, update_time, status, ticket, template_id
mapper.update: update t_coupon_qrc set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operator_id = #{operatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, combo_id = #{comboId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, pack_id = #{packId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, ticket = #{ticket,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, template_id = #{templateId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
